com.att.research.xacml.std

Class StdAdvice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.util.Wrapper<Advice>
      • com.att.research.xacml.std.StdAdvice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Advice

    public class StdAdvice
extends Wrapper<Advice>
implements Advice
    Immutable implementation of the Advice interface.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Christopher A. Rath

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StdAdvice(Advice advice)
      Creates an immutable StdAdvice that wraps the given Advice.
      StdAdvice(Identifier adviceId)
      Creates an immutable StdAdvice with the given Identifier as the XACML AdviceId and an empty list of AttributeAssignments.
      StdAdvice(Identifier adviceId, java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> attributeAssignmentsIn)
      Creates an immutable StdAdvice with the given Identifier as the XACML AdviceId and the given Collection of AttributeAssignments representing the XACML AttributeAssignment elements.

      • getId

        public Identifier getId()
        Description copied from interface: Advice
        Gets the Identifier for this Advice object. The Identifier uniquely identifies a XACML 3.0 AssociatedAdvice element in a Rule or Policy.
        Specified by:
        getId in interface Advice
        Returns:
        the Identifier for this Advice.

      • getAttributeAssignments

        public java.util.Collection<AttributeAssignment> getAttributeAssignments()
        Description copied from interface: Advice
        Gets the AttributeAssignments in this Advice object. If there are no AttributeAssignments in this Advice, an empty Collection must be returned. The returned Collection should not be modified. Implementations are free to return an immutable view to enforce this.
        Specified by:
        getAttributeAssignments in interface Advice
        Returns:
        the Collection of AttributeAssignments in this Advice object.
